title: 想問香港人權法包唔包制裁香港班商家佬

replies.msg:
oes Human Right and Democracy Act Cover Companies in HK?
藍絲識督灰 我都想知我地有無得督灰
I want to know whether we can report to President Trump some legal entities suppressed basic freedoms of HK people


例如國泰航空、新鴻基地產、黨鐵等等公司

For example, Cathay Pacific cultural revolution like internal policy, Sun Hung Kai Properties, as known as Sell Hong Kong, collude with HK Police to enter the shopping mall to beat normal citizens, as well as MTR, together with HK Police instigated the 831 Terrorist Attack. May US get involved and have the power to freeze their assets and sanction their foreign business?

如果真係包埋既話，大家千其唔好舉報，唔係D股票跌到仆街之餘，班商家佬要共享大灣區榮耀
Don’t report them if you have shares of these companies. Otherwise you will suffer loss and they will have to stay in ChiNa Hong Kong to share the glory of Greater Bay Area. You can gain nothing, only burn with them together. Don’t do this
屌 有無人舉報搞死呢班奶共垃圾？
